# CPTemplateApplicationInstrumentClusterSceneSessionRoleApplication

**Property List Key**

Configurations for scenes you use to display navigation content on a CarPlay Instrument Cluster.

## Discussion

After setting [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/CPSupportsInstrumentClusterNavigationScene] to `YES`, use this key to specify a scene configuration when displaying navigation content in the CarPlay Instrument Cluster.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CarPlay/displaying-content-in-carplay].

## Configuration name

- **UISceneConfigurationName**: The app-specific name you use to identify the scene.

## Scene objects

- **UISceneClassName**: The name of the scene class you want UIKit to instantiate.
- **UISceneDelegateClassName**: The name of the app-specific class you want UIKit to instantiate and use as the scene delegate object.

## CarPlay scene roles

- **CPTemplateApplicationSceneSessionRoleApplication**: Configurations for scenes that you use to display template content on a CarPlay-enabled vehicle screen.
- **CPTemplateApplicationDashboardSceneSessionRoleApplication**: Configurations for scenes that you use to display navigation content on a CarPlay Dashboard.
